verses.text: Again the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts came \add to me\add*, saying ,
Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts ; I was jealous for Zion with great jealousy , and I was jealous for her with great fury.

Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; I am returned unto Zion , and will dwell in the midst of Jerusalem : and Jerusalem shall be called a city of truth ; and the mountain of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts the holy mountain.

Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts ; There shall yet old men and old women dwell in the streets of Jerusalem , and every man with his staff in his hand for very age.\f + \fr 8.4 \ft very…: Heb. multitude of days\f*
And the streets of the city shall be full of boys and girls playing in the streets thereof.

Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts ; If it be marvellous in the eyes of the remnant of this people in these days , should it also be marvellous in mine eyes ? saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts.  +  r 8.6  t marvellous: or, hard, or, difficult *

Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts ; Behold, I will save my people from the east country , and from the west country ;\f + \fr 8.7 \ft the west…: Heb. the country of the going down of the sun\f*
And I will bring them, and they shall dwell in the midst of Jerusalem : and they shall be my people , and I will be their God , in truth and in righteousness. \p

¶ Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts ; Let your hands be strong , ye that hear in these days these words by the mouth of the prophets , which \add were\add* in the day \add that\add* the foundation of the house of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts was laid , that the temple might be built.

For before these days there was no hire for man , nor any hire for beast ; neither \add was there any\add* peace to him that went out or came in because of the affliction : for I set all men every one against his neighbour.\f + \fr 8.10 \ft there was…: or, the hire of man became nothing\f*
But now I \add will\add* not \add be\add* unto the residue of this people as in the former days , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts.

For the seed \add shall be\add* prosperous ; the vine shall give her fruit , and the ground shall give her increase , and the heavens shall give their dew ; and I will cause the remnant of this people to possess all these \add things\add*.\f + \fr 8.12 \ft prosperous: Heb. of peace\f*

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* as ye were a curse among the heathen , O house of Judah , and house of Israel ; so will I save you, and ye shall be a blessing : fear not, \add but\add* let your hands be strong.

For thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts ; As I thought to punish you, when your fathers provoked me to wrath , saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts , and I repented not:
So again have I thought in these days to do well unto Jerusalem and to the house of Judah : fear ye not. \p

¶ These \add are\add* the things that ye shall do ; Speak ye every man the truth to his neighbour ; execute the judgment of truth and peace in your gates :\f + \fr 8.16 \ft execute…: Heb. judge truth, and the judgment of peace\f*
And let none of you imagine evil in your hearts against his neighbour ; and love no false oath : for all these \add are things\add* that I hate , saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \p
¶ And the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts came unto me, saying ,

Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts ; The fast of the fourth \add month\add*, and the fast of the fifth , and the fast of the seventh , and the fast of the tenth , shall be to the house of Judah joy and gladness , and cheerful feasts ; therefore love the truth and peace.\f + \fr 8.19 \ft feasts: or, solemn, or, set times\f*
Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts ; \add It shall\add* yet \add come to pass\add*, that there shall come people , and the inhabitants of many cities :

And the inhabitants of one \add city\add* shall go to another , saying , Let us go speedily to pray before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and to seek the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts : I will go also.  +  r 8.21  t speedily: or, continually: Heb. going *  +  r 8.21  t to pray…: Heb. to intreat the face of *

Yea, many people and strong nations shall come to seek the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* of hosts in Jerusalem , and to pray before the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 8.22  t to pray…: Heb. to intreat the face of *

Thus saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of hosts ; In those days \add it shall come to pass\add*, that ten men shall take hold out of all languages of the nations , even shall take hold of the skirt of him that is a Jew , saying , We will go with you: for we have heard \add that\add* God \add is\add* with you.
